thread.title: Teresa Hill
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Teresa Hill

author: Teresa Hill
title: Teresa Hill
text: We had looked for a replacement shade for our hurricane lamp without much luck in our area. I found "Antique Lamp Supply" on the internet and was able to order a beautiful shade that fit our antique lamp perfectly. It came quickly and was wrapped so efficiently. The price was more than reasonable and we are very happy with how our lamp looks now. I would recommend this site to anyone looking for a beautiful and fairly priced item.
